'South Oil Company' (SOC) is a national Iraqi company responsible for the oil in
the south of Iraq. It is situated in Basrah, Iraq. South oil company is one of
the major fundamental formations of the Iraq National Oil Company (INOC). It was
the first nucleus and the basis of national direct investment projects in the
1970s, where the SOC was subsidiary to the national company.
categories: Oil and gas companies of Iraq
